Bonfires enables you to connect with people on the same web page that you're on, building community around the things that matter most to you.

You Are What You Surf  ğŸ’»ğŸŒ

With over 1 billion websites (and counting), the internet is vast.  And, in many ways, the web pages we visit as we navigate the internet define who we are. Talk directly with people who are reading the same article, looking at the same social profile, watching the same TV show, listening to the same music, etc. as you.  Wherever your internet exploration takes you, the Bonfires app is right there with you. Come join the global conversation taking place about the things that matter most to you.
